Dating: EARLY DYNASTIC PERIOD/THINITE PERIOD (not before); EARLY DYNASTIC PERIOD/THINITE PERIOD ?; OLD KINGDOM (not after)
Name: Jug
Description: This terracotta jug comes from the excavations of El-Lahun undertaken by the British School of Archaeology in 1921. The piece which has been painted in red could date from the beginning of the historic period.
